text: Robert George Goalby (March 14, 1929 â€“ January 20, 2022) was an American professional golfer on the PGA Tour. He won the Masters Tournament in 1968. He was born in Belleville, Illinois. He became a professional in 1952. He came in second place at the PGA Championship in 1962.
